title: Game crashes up on Match starting
body: Since I've got this new pc my game keeps crashing over and over. I tried lots of fixes such as the XBOX gamer bag thingy and reinstalling it everytime. It still hasn't changed and I'm really starting to get frustrated not being able to play.

replies.body: Where is it crashing exactly?  Are there any errors?  It sounds like an issue more pc related the game files.  Let me know!
